title: Timed Media Primary Asset Reference
description: Asset information about the main content that was played, but present on all ads and chapters that occur during the content's playback as well.

@id.title: Asset ID
@id.description: Identifier of the content, which can be used to tie back to other industry / CMS IDs.

dc:title.title: Media Name
dc:title.description: The friendly (human-readable) name of the timed media asset.

xmpDM:duration.title: Media Length/Runtime
xmpDM:duration.description: Length of primary media asset in seconds.

xdm:showType.title: Show Type
xdm:showType.description: The type of content e.g. Trailer, Full Episode.

iptc4xmpExt:Series.title: Series
iptc4xmpExt:Series.description: The series the show belongs to.

xdm:streamFormat.title: Stream Format
xdm:streamFormat.description: Free-form format of the stream (e.g. short, long).

iptc4xmpExt:Season.title: Season
iptc4xmpExt:Season.description: The season the show belongs to.

iptc4xmpExt:Episode.title: Episode
iptc4xmpExt:Episode.description: The episode the show belongs to.

iptc4xmpExt:Genre.title: Genre
iptc4xmpExt:Genre.description: Type or grouping of content as defined by content producer.

iptc4xmpExt:Rating.title: Content Rating
iptc4xmpExt:Rating.description: The rating as defined by Parental Guidelines.

iptc4xmpExt:RatingValue.title: Episode Name
iptc4xmpExt:RatingValue.description: Rating value as issued by the rating source.

iptc4xmpExt:RatingSourceLink.title: Episode Identifier
iptc4xmpExt:RatingSourceLink.description: Link to the site and optionally the page of the party which has issued the rating value, linked resource should explain the rating rules.

iptc4xmpExt:Creator.title: Creator
iptc4xmpExt:Creator.description: Party or parties (person or organisation) which created the video, refinement by the role attribute.
